title: no keys again really!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: give me keys guys i was playing for a 2 monthes and u didnt give any key fragment i win alot of games why me league of legends????

replies.body: The drop rate for key fragments are more of  a curve than a line.  Per our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide), you will earn more at first and the chances will slowly decrease until it resets in roughly 30 days.  Once the reset occurs, you'll find yourself earning more fragments at a quicker rate- rinse and repeat.  Keys chests are also available for purchase through the in-game store.  Best of luck!
ok thank you i well try to get them from store
